You can try to reload the page you were visiting.
Error.title: Something went wrong!

PathnamesPage.description:
The pathnames are internationalized too.

If you're using the default language English, you'll see /en/pathnames in the browser address bar on this page.

If you change the locale to German, the URL is localized accordingly (/es/rutas).
PathnamesPage.title: Pathnames

Hero.description: Don't follow the rules, reinvent the game. Direct connection with your audience, unique features, more competitive commissions and advanced tools to maximize your earnings.

Description1.title: The subscription platform for creating, connecting and monetizing without limits
Description1.description: At Alonear™, freedom is yours: design unique memberships, offer 1-on-1 calls and share posts that captivate your fans. With advanced tools and an intuitive and elegant design, each interaction fuels your creativity and your earnings.

Description2.title: Reinvent how you connect and monetize
Description2.description: With Alonear™, you decide how to connect with your audience. Customize your interactions with unique tools like direct messages, 1-on-1 calls, and exclusive memberships. Make your fans part of something more than content: a unique experience that highlights your talent.

Features.title: The tools you need to scale your success and become the

items.title: One-on-one calls by the minute
items.description: Charge for your time in private conversations with your followers. Share tips, offer mentorship, or simply connect authentically while keeping your privacy intact.

items.title: Paid direct messages
items.description: Monetize your private interactions through messages, photos, or videos, designed to captivate your most loyal followers.

items.title: Customizable memberships
items.description: Offer exclusive access to your most special content, with plans tailored to the needs of your followers.

items.title: Your own marketplace
items.description: Sell unique products, downloadable content, autographed memorabilia, and more, directly from your profile. Turn your creativity into a constant source of income.

items.title: Discounts and gifts
items.description: Offer free trials, exclusive discount codes, or accept gifts from your followers without compromising your privacy.

items.title: Wishlist
items.description: Allow your fans to send you gifts without sharing your personal information.

AntiScreenshot.title: Your Content, Your Control, Your Rules
AntiScreenshot.description: Alonear not only protects your content, but also empowers it. Our anti-capture technology and unique watermarks ensure that every piece of content is completely protected, giving you peace of mind to focus on what you do best: creating. With Alonear, you have total control over who has access to your content, how you monetize it, and how you connect with your fans. There are no limits, only possibilities.

Fees.title: More for You, Because You Deserve It
Fees.description: At Alonear™, you keep 90% of your earnings. No hidden fees, no complications. Just you, your talent, and the earnings you truly deserve.

items.question: Absolute Anonymity
items.answer: We protect your identity and your followers' with advanced privacy technology. You decide how much you share and how you interact.

items.question: More Competitive Market Commissions
items.answer: At Alonear, you keep 90% of your earnings because we know your talent deserves more. No hidden fees, no complications.

items.question: Exclusive 1-on-1 Interactions
items.answer: Connect privately with your followers, offering 1-on-1 calls, direct messages, and exclusive memberships. Make your fans part of something more than content: a unique experience that highlights your talent.

items.question: Complete and Intuitive Platform
items.answer: Designed for creators of all levels, with easy-to-use tools that allow you to focus on what really matters: your content.

items.question: Unlimited Monetization
items.answer: From customizable memberships to live streams, you decide how to earn money. Freedom is yours.

items.question: Elegance and Exclusivity
items.answer: Inspired by the best in luxury and sophistication, we've created a space that reflects the essence of your content and elevates your presence.
